subject: Something I forgot in some boxes
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
A way to hold the top up and out of the way so it doesn't just flop over.
Also seems to help push the sound forward. How's that ambidextrous?

 F-S

A way o hold he op up and ou o he way so i doesn' jus lop o e . Also seems o help push he sound o wa d. How's ha ambidex ous?
